original_title: Super Bowl XXXVII Champions: Tampa Bay Buccaneers
overview: Follow the Buccaneers from opening day right through their Super Bowl triumph, as NFL Films provides an all-access pass to the huddle, sidelines and locker room. Relive the highlights from every game of Tampa Bay's amazing season -- capped by their astonishing 48-21 defeat of the Oakland Raiders in Super Bowl XXXVII.
title: Super Bowl XXXVII Champions: Tampa Bay Buccaneers
